page.title: 05Mattersey Football Club
page.content: Mattersey & Mattersey Thorpe United Football Club was formed in 1978 after a period of 25 years where there was no village team. After a very poor start in the 1978/9 season they finished in the lower half of Division Three of the Retford and District Sunday Football League. The following season promotion was won to Division Two of that League. In 1983/4 a second team was formed which finished midway up Division Three whilst the 'A' Team won Division Two. Unfortunately the 'A' team broke up at the end of the season but the other team have gained promotion to Division Two of the Retford League. The ground is owned by the Council but is for the "use of the village". The football club maintains the ground which has been developed from rough ground.
